00046 def exportHtml(fname, fields, result, write_title=False):
00047         try:
00048                 f = file(fname, 'wb+')
00049                 f.write( '<html>' )
00050                 f.write( '<head><title>' + _('OpenERP exported information') + '</title></head>' )
00051                 f.write( '<table>' )
00052                 if write_title:
00053                         f.write( '<tr>' )
00054                         for x in fields:
00055                                 x = unicode(x)
00056                                 f.write('<th>%s</th>' % x)
00057                         f.write( '</tr>' )
00058                 for x in result:
00059                         row = []
00060                         for y in x:
00061                                 y = unicode(y)
00062                                 y = y.replace('\n','<br/>').replace('\t','&nbsp;')
00063                                 y = y.replace('<','&lt;').replace('>','&gt;').replace('&','&amp;')
00064                                 row.append(y)
00065                         f.write( '<tr>' )
00066                         f.write( '<td>%s</td>' % ( '</td><td>'.join( row ) ) )
00067                         f.write( '</tr>' )
00068                 f.close()
00069                 QMessageBox.information( None, '', _('%s record(s) saved!') % (str(len(result))) )
00070         except IOError, (errno, strerror):
00071                 QMessageBox.warning( None, '', _("Operation failed !\nI/O error (%s)") % (errno))
00072 
00073 def exportCsv(fname, fields, result, write_title=False):
00074         try:
00075                 fp = codecs.open( fname, 'wb+', 'utf8' )
00076                 if write_title:
00077                         fp.write( ','.join( fields ) + '\n' )
00078                 for data in result:
00079                         row = []
00080                         for d in data:
00081                                 if type(d)==types.StringType:
00082                                         row.append('"' + d.replace('\n',' ').replace('\t',' ').replace('"',"\\\"") + '"')
00083                                 else:
00084                                         row.append(d)
00085                         fp.write( ','.join( row ) + '\n' )
00086                 fp.close()
00087                 QMessageBox.information( None, _('Data Export'), _('%s record(s) saved!') % (str(len(result))) )
00088         except IOError, (errno, strerror):
00089                 QMessageBox.warning( None, _('Data Export'), _("Operation failed !\nI/O error (%s)") % (errno))
00090         except Except:
00091                 QMessageBox.warning( None, _('Data Export'), _("Error exporting data.") )
00092 
00093 def openExcel(fields, fieldsType, result):
00094         try:
00095                 from win32com.client import Dispatch
00096                 xlApp = Dispatch("Excel.Application")
00097                 xlApp.Workbooks.Add()
00098                 for col in range(len(fields)):
00099                         xlApp.ActiveSheet.Cells(1,col+1).Value = fields[col]
00100                 sht = xlApp.ActiveSheet
00101 
00102                 for a in result:
00103                         for b in range(len(a)):
00104                                 if type(a[b]) == type(''):
00105                                         a[b]=a[b].decode('utf-8','replace')
00106                                 elif type(a[b]) == type([]):
00107                                         if len(a[b])==2:
00108                                                 a[b] = a[b][1].decode('utf-8','replace')
00109                                         else:
00110                                                 a[b] = ''
00111                                 if fieldsType[b] in ('float', 'integer'):
00112                                         if Numeric.isNumeric( a[b] ):
00113                                                 a[b] = float( a[b] )
00114                 sht.Range(sht.Cells(2, 1), sht.Cells(len(result)+1, len(fields))).Value = result
00115                 
00116                 xlApp.Visible = 1
00117         except:
00118                 QMessageBox.warning(None, '', _('Error opening Excel !'))
00119 
00120 def exportData(ids, model, fields, prefix=''):
00121         data = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', model, 'export_data', ids, fields)
00122         return data

00126 class ExportDialog( QDialog, ExportDialogUi ):
00127         def __init__(self, model, ids, fields, preload =[], parent=None):
00128                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00129                 ExportDialogUi.__init__(self)
00130                 self.setupUi( self )
00131 
00132                 self.ids = ids
00133                 self.model = model
00134                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAccept )
00135                 self.connect( self.pushCancel, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.reject )
00136                 self.connect( self.pushAdd, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAdd )
00137                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotRemove )
00138                 self.connect( self.pushRemoveAll, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotRemoveAll )
00139                 self.connect( self.pushSave, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotSave )
00140                 self.connect( self.pushRemoveExport, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotRemoveExport )
00141                 self.connect( self.uiPredefined, SIGNAL('activated(const QModelIndex&)'), self.loadCurrentStored )
00142 
00143                 if os.name == 'nt':
00144                         self.uiFormat.addItem( _("Open with Excel"), QVariant('excel') )
00145 
00146                 self.uiFormat.addItem( _("Save as CSV"), QVariant('csv') )
00147                 self.uiFormat.addItem( _("Save as HTML"), QVariant('html') )
00148 
00149                 self.fieldsInfo = {}
00150                 self.allModel = FieldsModel()
00151                 self.setCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00152                 self.allModel.load( fields, self.fieldsInfo )
00153                 self.setCursor( Qt.ArrowCursor )
00154                 self.uiAllFields.setModel( self.allModel )
00155                 self.uiAllFields.sortByColumn( 0, Qt.AscendingOrder )
00156 
00157                 self.selectedModel = FieldsModel()
00158                 self.uiSelectedFields.setModel( self.selectedModel )
00159 
00160                 self.storedModel = StoredExportsModel()
00161                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )
00162                 self.uiPredefined.setModel( self.storedModel )
00163                 self.uiPredefined.hideColumn(0)
00164                 self.uiPredefined.hideColumn(1)
00165 
00166         def slotRemoveExport(self):
00167                 idx = self.uiPredefined.selectionModel().selectedRows(1)
00168                 if len(idx) != 1:
00169                         return
00170                 idx = idx[0]
00171                 id = int( unicode( self.storedModel.itemFromIndex( idx ).text() ) )
00172                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00173                 ir_export.unlink([id])
00174                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )
00175                 
00176         def loadCurrentStored(self):
00177                 idx = self.uiPredefined.selectionModel().selectedRows(0)
00178                 if len(idx) != 1:
00179                         return
00180                 idx = idx[0]
00181                 fields = unicode( self.storedModel.itemFromIndex( idx ).text() )
00182                 fields = fields.split(', ') 
00183                 if self.selectedModel.rowCount() > 0:
00184                         self.selectedModel.removeRows(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() )
00185                 for x in fields:
00186                         newItem = QStandardItem()
00187                         newItem.setText( unicode( self.fieldsInfo[x]['string'] ) )
00188                         newItem.setData( QVariant(x) )
00189                         self.selectedModel.appendRow( newItem )
00190 
00191         def slotAccept(self):
00192                 fields = []
00193                 fieldTitles = []
00194                 for x in range(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() ):
00195                         fields.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item( x ).data().toString() ) )
00196                         fieldTitles.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item( x ).text() ) )
00197                 action = unicode( self.uiFormat.itemData(self.uiFormat.currentIndex()).toString() )
00198                 result = exportData(self.ids, self.model, fields)
00199                 if action == 'excel':
00200                         fieldsType = [self.fieldsInfo[x]['type'] for x in fields]
00201                         openExcel(fieldTitles, fieldsType, result)
00202                 else:
00203                         fname = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName( self, _('Export Data') )
00204                         if not fname.isNull():
00205                                 if action == 'csv':
00206                                         exportCsv(fname, fieldTitles, result, self.uiAddFieldNames.isChecked() )
00207                                 else:
00208                                         exportHtml(fname, fieldTitles, result, self.uiAddFieldNames.isChecked() )
00209 
00210         def slotAdd(self):
00211                 idx = self.uiAllFields.selectionModel().selectedRows()
00212                 if len(idx) != 1:
00213                         return 
00214                 idx = idx[0]
00215                 item = self.allModel.itemFromIndex( idx )
00216                 newItem = QStandardItem( item )
00217                 newItem.setText( self.fullPathText(item) )
00218                 newItem.setData( QVariant(self.fullPathData(item)) )
00219                 self.selectedModel.appendRow( newItem )
00220 
00221         def slotRemove(self):
00222                 idx = self.uiSelectedFields.selectedIndexes()
00223                 if len(idx) != 1:
00224                         return
00225                 idx = idx[0]
00226                 self.selectedModel.removeRows( idx.row(), 1 )
00227 
00228         def slotRemoveAll(self):
00229                 if self.selectedModel.rowCount() > 0:
00230                         self.selectedModel.removeRows(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount())
00231 
00232         def fullPathText(self, item):
00233                 path = unicode( item.text() )
00234                 while item.parent() != None:
00235                         item = item.parent()
00236                         path = item.text() + "/" + path
00237                 return path
00238         
00239         def fullPathData(self, item):
00240                 path = unicode( item.data().toString() )
00241                 while item.parent() != None:
00242                         item = item.parent()
00243                         path = item.data().toString() + "/" + path
00244                 return path
00245 
00246         def slotSave(self):
00247                 name, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, '', _('What is the name of this export?'))
00248                 if not ok:
00249                         return
00250                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00251                 fields = []
00252                 for x in range(0, self.selectedModel.rowCount() ):
00253                         fields.append( unicode( self.selectedModel.item(x).data().toString() ) )
00254 
00255                 ir_export.create({'name' : unicode(name), 'resource' : self.model, 'export_fields' : [(0, 0, {'name' : f}) for f in fields]})
00256                 self.storedModel.load( self.model, self.fieldsInfo )
00257 
00258 # This model holds the information of the predefined exports
00259 # For each item we store the fields list (with the internal name), the name of the export and
00260 # the fields list (with the external -user friendly- name).
00261 class StoredExportsModel( QStandardItemModel ):
00262         def __init__(self):
00263                 QStandardItemModel.__init__(self)
00264                 self.rootItem = self.invisibleRootItem()
00265                 self.setColumnCount( 4 )
00266                 self.setHeaderData( 0, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant('Field list (internal names)') )
00267                 self.setHeaderData( 1, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant('Export id') )
00268                 self.setHeaderData( 2, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _('Export name') ) )
00269                 self.setHeaderData( 3, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _('Exported fields') ) )
00270 
00271         def load(self, model, fieldsInfo):
00272                 if self.rowCount() > 0:
00273                         self.removeRows(0, self.rowCount())
00274                 ir_export = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports')
00275                 ir_export_line = Rpc.RpcProxy('ir.exports.line')
00276                 export_ids = ir_export.search([('resource', '=', model)])
00277                 for export in ir_export.read(export_ids):
00278                         fields = ir_export_line.read(export['export_fields'])
00279 
00280                         allFound = True
00281                         for f in fields:
00282                                 if not f['name'] in fieldsInfo:
00283                                         allFound = False
00284                                         break
00285                         if not allFound:
00286                                 continue
00287 
00288                         items = [ QStandardItem( ', '.join([f['name'] for f in fields]) ), QStandardItem( str(export['id']) ), QStandardItem( export['name'] ), QStandardItem( ', '.join( [fieldsInfo[f['name']]['string'] for f in fields] ) ) ]
00289                         self.rootItem.appendRow( items )
